entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being in a situation where he needs to avoid Filch.

entities.name: argus filch
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is known for being strict and having a cat named Mrs Norris. He has flu and is cleaning up after students.

entities.name: nick
entities.description: A character who warns Harry to leave the area because Filch is in a bad mood.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Filch's cat, which seems to have some sort of mysterious connection with Harry.

relationships.description: Harry is caught by Filch for dripping mud all over the place.
Nick warns Harry to get out of the area because Filch is in a bad mood.
